name: YouTube Dark X
description:
If you too hate the white YouTube shining all over your room at 2AM, this solves the problem.
For all of those who don't like watching at a heavy white default style of YouTube.

PLEASE, CHECK BACK FOR UPDATES!

P.S.
If you want to show some love, drop me a line over at Twitter @nemanjacosovic ;)

user.name: sirNemanjapro
user.about: Web developer from Serbia. Working mostly on local and NDA projects. I love simple and effective design.

css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document domain("youtube.com"){#yt-masthead-container{background:#999!important;border-top:2px solid #CCC!important;border-bottom:3px solid #666!important}body >#body-container,#page,#watch7-content,#watch7-sidebar .watch-sidebar-section,.yt-uix-button-panel,#watch7-headline,#watch7-user-header,.yt-uix-button-panel,#watch7-headline,#watch7-user-header,#watch7-action-buttons,#watch-discussion,#watch7-sidebar{background:#222!important;border:none!important}#eow-title,#watch7-user-header .yt-user-name,#comments-view .comment-text p{color:#9F9F9F!important}#watch7-headline .yt-uix-expander-head:hover{color:#F93!important}#watch7-user-header .yt-user-photo{border:2px solid #666!important}#watch-like.yt-uix-button,#watch-dislike.yt-uix-button,#watch-description-toggle .yt-uix-button-text,.comments-pagination .yt-uix-pager-button{background:#999!important}.watch-view-count,#watch-uploader-info,#eow-description,.video-list .video-list-item .title{color:#636363!important}ul#all-comments li.comment{background:#1b1b1b!important;padding:10px!important;border-top:1px solid #737373!important}ul#all-comments li.comment:hover{border-top:1px solid #F93!important}.video-list-item{padding:6px 0!important;margin-bottom:1px!important;background:#1b1b1b!important}.video-list-item:hover{background:#262626!important}#comments-view >ul >li.comment{padding:6px 8px!important;background:#1b1b1b!important}#comments-view >ul >li.comment:hover{background:#262626!important}#watch7-action-panel-footer .yt-horizontal-rule{margin:0!important}.comment-action-vote-up,.comment-action-vote-down{background:#262626!important;padding:0 3px!important;border-radius:1px;margin:0 3px!important}.branded-page-v2-primary-col,.yt-horizontal-rule{background:#262626!important;border-top:none!important}.yt-lockup .yt-lockup-meta a,.yt-lockup .yt-lockup-description a{ color:#C0C0C0!important}.feed-item-main .feed-item-header a,.feed-item-main a.yt-user-name{ color:#B0B0B0!important}.feed-item-container .feed-item-main{border-bottom:1px solid #737373!important}#watch7-secondary-actions,.share-panel-main-buttons{background:#999!important;padding:0 3px!important;border-radius:3px!important}#share-panel-buttons .yt-uix-button{margin-bottom:0!important;margin-right:10px!important}#watch7-action-panel-footer .yt-horizontal-rule{height:0!important}}
